svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of children in employment vs. GDP per capita, 2012
PPP adjusted GDP per capita in constant 2011 international dollars (World Bank Data), Share of children ages 7-14
involved in economic activity (World Bank data), Population ages 5-14 (UN data)
PPP adjusted GDP per capita (in constant 2011 int-$)
Children in employment, total (% of children ages 7-14)
Source: World Bank – WDI, UN Population Division (2015)
